item.description:
Most people living in the United States of America are familiar with the term “in god we trust.” however, it is not often that we have a chance to explore what the meaning is behind this concept.

Allah, Shiva, Jehovah, Source, Higher Power – these are some of the names for the Divine spirit or being whom all peoples and cultures pay homage to. Great praise has been given to the Divine for showing us the right path, inspiring us to be our best and forgiving us when we miss the mark. Throughout recorded history people have invoked the Divine in times of need. And from the very birth of our nation, US currency has been engraved with the phrase In God we trust.

Who is this Divine so deserving of humanity’s unflinching faith and trust? Why is He the One we invoke when all else fails? What great act of benevolence merits His enduring place in our hearts?

group.name: Owning Greatness Through Raja Yoga Manchester Meetup Group

item.name: In God We Trust
